artist: Designer: Jack Larsen; Mill: Jack Lenor Larsen Inc.; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Random weft floats of various threads and textures, on plain weave ground. Olive, yellow, gold & rust warp. Olive weft. Stapled. inside mat folder. Right selvedge. Machine stitched other 3 sides. Some Larsen info. inside folder. "H-5" printed on outside folder. green & gold dot.
image_copyright: © Jack Lenor Larsen%2C Inc. %2F Limelight%2C Jack Larsen%2C 1953
medium: Linen, metlon, cotton, viscose. Woven fabric.
title: Limelight
